name: ハトとホットドッグ
description:
The main character Hato is a Japanese business pigeon.

His boss has been putting double the work with half the pay on him, 
he is incredibly stressed out and just wants to enjoy a nice Hot Dog on his lunch break.
But then, suddenly, humans try to steal his hot dog. He won’t let them take his hot dog,
He has had enough and won’t let them take the only the onlys thing he is excited for today.

You're a pigeon that need to steal hotdogs from people to win! But the mean people are not happy about this and try to attack you, they're out of control and can even fly! Poop on them to make them disappear!
